TPPA.abnormal: Positive in latent yaws, but cannot distinguish from syphilis

RPR.abnormal: Positive in latent yaws, but cannot distinguish from syphilis

PCR.abnormal: Positive for Treponema pallidum subspecies pertenue DNA in active lesions; negative in latent yaws

risk_factors: Living in poor communities in warm, humid, and tropical forest areas

required: Clinical presentation consistent with latent yaws (absence of active lesions)
Positive serological tests (TPPA, RPR), but requires careful clinical assessment to differentiate from syphilis
supportive: Negative PCR for T. pallidum subspecies pertenue DNA in skin lesions
